title: Channel Integration API
description: schema for retailops webhook channel integrations

is_failure.description: boolean success value represented as integer (0, 1)

request_url.description: request url for this service action

additonal.description: additional information re: missing or invalid parameters

message.example: Missing or invalid parameter: PackagWeight.Unit Invalid unit of measurement specified try (lbs)

sellable.description: number of item in inventory that can be sold

links.rel: create, destroy, self, instances, or update
links.title: Fetch
